headline: Sam’s Club Members Now Get Free Same-Day Delivery of Refrigerated Medications, including GLP-1s
summary: BENTONVILLE, Ark., October 06, 2025--Sam’s Club today announced that members can now receive same-day delivery of refrigerated prescriptions, with free delivery for Plus Members. The service covers a wide range of medications that require temperature-controlled handling—including GLP-1s, insulin, antibiotics and other specialty prescriptions—ensuring safe, timely and convenient access to critical treatments. headline: Klarna Stock Gets First Ratings After IPO. A Lot of Analysts Say It’s a Buy.
summary: The bank began coverage with a Buy rating and a target of $55 for the stock price, saying Klarna is “the market leader” in the buy-now, pay-later business.  Klarna has “a particularly strong franchise in Europe, where we believe Klarna is a new, emerging closed loop payment scheme, similar to  American Express  in the United States,” the analysts wrote.  The nod to AmEx, one of the largest credit-card providers in the U.S., parallels commentary from members of management, who told Barron’s ahead of the IPO that the company was aiming to challenge the traditional banking sector.

raw.headline: Klarna Stock Gets First Ratings After IPO. A Lot of Analysts Say It’s a Buy.
raw.summary: The bank began coverage with a Buy rating and a target of $55 for the stock price, saying Klarna is “the market leader” in the buy-now, pay-later business. The nod to AmEx, one of the largest credit-card providers in the U.S., parallels commentary from members of management, who told Barron’s ahead of the IPO that the company was aiming to challenge the traditional banking sector.

headline: Amazon’s October Prime Days Start Tuesday. It’s an Early Test for the Holidays.
summary: Amazon’s  second Prime sales event of the year is here, marking the unofficial start of the holiday shopping season.  Prime’s Big Deal Days, for Amazon Prime members, is on Tuesday and Wednesday.  Members of Target Circle will receive discounts of up to 50% across various categories of goods.

headline: Ritual Expands Retail Footprint with Walmart Launch, Bringing Foundational Women's Supplements Nationwide
summary: Ritual, the women's health brand working to set a new standard in the supplement industry with traceable science and traceable sourcing, recently announced it has expanded its wholesale retail presence with a launch at Walmart. Four of Ritual's most trusted women's health supplements are now available at select Walmart stores across the US and online at Walmart.com.

headline: Online Holiday Spending Expected to Rise 5.3%, Fueled by Debt
summary: Shoppers plan to curb overall holiday spending due to tariff-related price increases and a weakening labor market, according to a survey released in September by PricewaterhouseCoopers.  Checkout options that let shoppers purchase items and pay for them over time will drive $20.2 billion in holiday spending, up 11% from a year earlier and more than twice the pace of overall spending growth, according to Adobe, which monitors traffic to retail websites and sales of more than 100 million products.

raw.headline: Online Holiday Spending Expected to Rise 5.3%, Fueled by Debt
raw.summary: Shoppers plan to curb overall holiday spending due to tariff-related price increases and a weakening labor market, according to a survey released in September by PricewaterhouseCoopers. headline: Stocks, Gold, Bitcoin Are Soaring. This Could Reverse the Market Rally and 5 More Things to Know Today.
summary: The S&P 500 is on a six-day winning streak, which includes every trading day of the shutdown and the three sessions building up to it.  The index hasn’t climbed for seven straight days since early May. Gold and Bitcoin have also been surging, with both hitting record highs.  Unfortunately, anything that dents that confidence is likely to also hurt a stock market trading at record highs.
